/about.description: describes GoferBot, and links to the project page

/caption.description: creates a caption meme, given a link to an image and captions

params.[url]: a link that points to an image
params.[\"top\"]: the top caption, encased by quotes
params.[\"bot\"]: the bot caption, encased by quotes

/caption (with an attached image).description: creates a caption meme, given an image and captions

params.[\"top\"]: the top caption, encased by quotes
params.[\"bot\"]: the bot caption, encased by quotes

/caption (with a reply to an image or st.description: creates a caption meme, given a replied image/sticker and captions

params.[\"top\"]: the top caption, encased by quotes
params.[\"bot\"]: the bot caption, encased by quotes

/everyone.description: pings everyone (that has participated at least once since the bot was added)

/help.description: lists all commands, what they do and their syntax
